CustomField.description: Used to determine if HCP record is Active.
CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( OR ( text( Agreement_Status_Contact__c)= "Signed / Returned", text( Agreement_Status_Contact__c)= "W-9 Only", text( Agreement_Status_Contact__c)= "No Stipend"), Account.Ninety_Days_Activity__c > 0), "Active", "")
CustomField.label: HCP Status
